data.title: Delta Goodrem - Songs, Events and Music Stats
data.meta_description: Delta Goodrem: Listen to new and popular songs, find events, look into their stats and see who their fans are.
data.text:
Australian pop artist Delta Goodrem is from Sydney. She performs songs that is classified as Mainstream Pop. Beginning her musical career in the early 2000s, Goodrem has established herself as a prominent presence in the Australian music scene. Goodrem has established himself as a household figure in the Pop scene after more than 20 years in the business.

Melodic lyrics, peppy rhythms, and catchy hooks are the hallmarks of Goodrem's music. Numerous musical styles, including Pop, Rock, and R&B, have inspired her sound. She is one of Australia's most adored Pop musicians thanks to her vocal range and capacity to express emotion through music.

With a long list of number-one songs and a devoted following, Delta Goodrem's success is unstoppable. She continues to excite and amuse audiences across the world with her contagious enthusiasm and passion for music. Her impact to the Pop music landscape has not gone ignored.

The well-known pop performer from Sydney, Australia, Delta Goodrem, has a number of well-liked songs that have mesmerized listeners all over the world. "Lost Without You," one of her most well-known songs, is a stunning ballad that highlights her strong vocals and emotional range. The song is a fan favorite and has solidified its position in pop music history because to its eerie melody and moving lyrics.

Another well-known song that highlights Delta Goodrem's abilities as a performer and lyricist is "Wings". The song is a perfect candidate for radio play because to its cheerful speed and catchy chorus, and its powerful message has connected with listeners all around the world. A few of Delta Goodrem's other well-known songs are "Sitting on Top of the World," "Born to Try," "All Out of Love," and "Almost Here."

The popularity of Delta Goodrem's music spans linguistic and cultural boundaries. People of all ages and socioeconomic groups enjoy her songs, and her music has integrated itself into the pop music scene. Whether you've been a fan for a while or are just discovering Delta Goodrem, her songs are certain to have an impact and serve as the soundtrack to some of life's most special moments.

With the release of her most recent album and several songs, Sydney, Australia's gifted pop musician Delta Goodrem has been keeping busy. In addition to a standard edition, "Bridge Over Troubled Dreams" also came in a deluxe edition and a commentary version. The album consists of a variety of happy and sad songs that highlight Goodrem's vocal range and compositional skills.

"Billionaire" is one of the album's major songs; it's a lively, cheerful tune with Goodrem's distinctive piano-driven vibe. The more emotive track "All of My Friends," from another single, examines the difficulties of friendships and relationships. Furthermore, in 2020, the songs "Solid Gold (Remixes)" and "Solid Gold (Acoustic Remix)" were published, displaying Goodrem's range as a musician.

Her most recent albums continue a tradition of Goodrem's music reflecting her own life experiences. She keeps enthralling audiences all over the world with her poignant words and commanding voice. As she continues to develop as an artist, fans may anticipate seeing what she has in store for them next.

The Australian artist Delta Goodrem has performed at prestigious venues and festivals all around the world. In addition to Qudos Bank Arena, she has also performed at the O2 Academy Glasgow, Arts Centre Melbourne, Riverbend Music Center, The Olympia Theatre, and others.

At the O2 Academy Glasgow in Scotland, Delta Goodrem had one of her most unforgettable performances. A full house cheered her on enthusiastically as she sang hit songs like "Born to Try" and "Innocent Eyes" for the audience. The audience was enthralled by Delta's strong vocals and captivating stage presence and left wanting more.

At the Arts Centre Melbourne in Australia, Delta Goodrem made another remarkable appearance. She gave a performance of her brand-new tune "Paralyzed" off her forthcoming record "Bridge Over Troubled Dreams." A flawless fusion of soulful lyrics, pulsating beats, and Delta's distinctive piano playing made up the performance.

Coachella, Glastonbury, and Lollapalooza are just a few of the music festivals at which Delta Goodrem has performed. She has become a crowd favorite at these events thanks to her electrifying performances and chart-topping tunes.

In conclusion, Delta Goodrem has irrevocably changed the Mainstream Pop music scene with her soulful lyrics, exciting stage presence, and powerful voice. Her reputation as one of the most influential performers of our time has been solidified by her appearances at prestigious venues and festivals throughout the world.

The Australian musical phenomenon Delta Goodrem has worked with various bands during her career. Among the collaborations, "All Out of Love" with Westlife, "Almost Here" with Brian McFadden, "Let it Snow, Let it Snow, Let it Snow" with Human Nature, "Let Me Be There" with Olivia Newton-John, and "Vente Pa' Ca" with Ricky Martin are a few that stand out.

"Almost Here" with Brian McFadden is one of her most well-known joint projects. The song was released in 2005 and quickly rose to the top of the ARIA Charts in Australia, where it was a huge smash. Additionally praised by critics, the song was nominated for various prizes. The wonderful chemistry between Delta and Brian, who were dating at the time, was largely responsible for the song's success. The lyrics of the song eloquently encapsulated the experience of being in a long-distance relationship, and their voices harmonised to produce a lovely melody.

The Olivia Newton-John song "Let Me Be There" is another noteworthy duet. The song debuted in 1973 and immediately became a huge hit, peaking at number six on the US Billboard Hot 100 chart. Olivia Newton-John appeared in Delta's 2004 recording of the song. The song was a lovely rendition of the original, and the two singers' voices blended together beautifully.

Collaborations have been essential to Delta Goodrem's career as a musician. They have given her the freedom to experiment with many musical styles and collaborate with some of the best musicians in the world, resulting in stunning music that has moved millions of listeners all over the world.

What happen to Delta Goodrem?

After overcoming cancer and having a salivary gland surgically removed in 2018, Delta Goodrem was left mute and unable to perform. In 2020, she made this known.

What happened to Delta Goodrem when she was 18?

On 8 July 2003, at the age of 18, Delta Goodrem was diagnosed with Hodgkin's lymphoma.

What age is Delta Goodrem?

38 years (November 9, 1984)

How rich is Delta Goodrem?

The net worth of Delta Goodrem is $18 Million.

Can Delta Goodrem speak?

Due to sickness, the Australian singer Delta Goodrem was unable to speak or sing, but she recovered completely and has since recorded a seventh album. Although she acknowledged that the experience was difficult, she never had any doubts about her abilities to return to the stage.

Is Delta Goodrem still in a relationship?

Delta is currently in a private relationship with musician Matthew Copley.

Which Jonas brother went out with Delta Goodrem?

Nick Jonas went out with Delta Goodrem.

Did Delta Goodrem have leukemia?

Australian singer Delta Goodrem was diagnosed with Hodgkin's lymphoma in 2003 at the age of 18.

When was Delta Goodrem paralyzed?

Due to difficulties with the procedure to remove Delta Goodrem's salivary gland, a nerve in her tongue was paralyzed in October 2018, which made it impossible for her to speak normally.

Is Delta Goodrem a smoker?

Perez Hilton claimed in 2009 that Delta Goodrem smoked, but her mother and agent refuted the claims.

Did Delta Goodrem leave The Voice?

Goodrem's departure from The Voice provided her more time to concentrate on her music career, and in May of this year, her most recent album, Bridge Over Troubled Dreams, topped the charts. In March 2022, she is set to start a nationwide tour in support of the record, which was postponed because of Covid lockdowns.

Where is Delta Goodrem living now?

Delta Goodrem resides in a multimillion dollar condo in Sydney's "The Residence" directly across from Hyde Park.

How many Arias has Delta Goodrem won?

With nine #1 singles, five #1 albums, 17 top 10 hits, 12 ARIA Awards, a Silver Logie Award, and three World Music Awards, Delta has attained multi-platinum selling status.

What surgery did Delta Goodrem have?

The singer Delta Goodrem had her salivary gland removed, which caused a nerve in her tongue to become paralyzed and rendered her speechless.

Who has Delta Goodrem been engaged to?

Delta Goodrem has been engaged to Brian McFadden.

How much money does Delta Goodrem make?

Delta Goodrem has an estimated net worth of $16 million dollars.

How old is Delta Goodrem?

38 years (November 9, 1984)

Is Delta Goodrem still with Seal?

8. Seal. In 2017, it was said that Seal, another Voice coach at the time, and Delta started dating. Delta has been "spending a lot of time with Seal off-set and she's fallen hard for him," a source told Woman's Day, even though the two never made their feelings known publicly. It's not known if they still live together.

Why did Delta Goodrem need her salivary gland removed?

At the tail end of 2018, Delta Goodrem required treatment and surgery in the US due to significant calcification of her salivary gland, which necessitated removal of the gland.
